strings.Value: "Fruit? Tuskwater oysters might be better, if you know what I mean."

{n}Meeting you at the capital gate, Tristian puts his hand on your shoulder.{/n} "Before you are abducted by your advisors..." {n}The deva smiles.{/n} "Let's hide from them. Your chambers. Wine. Perhaps fruit. You and I."
{n}Tristan's expression of sincere bafflement, well-known to you, appears on his face.{/n} "Oysters? Of course, if you like them..."
{n}Laughing, Tristian holds you.{/n} "Ha, then an abduction is imminent! And I will be the abductor!"
{n}Mixing with the crowd, you race towards the palace.{/n}
